author: marekm3498
content: https://github.com/NethermindEth/nethermind/releases/tag/1.13.2 we've just released new version. With previous release we managed to do transition on MSF6. However, in the new version we hardcoded correct TTD, fixed a few hive tests, added fixes in post-merge sync ðŸ™‚

author: matt.nelson
content:
Hi all - If you are running Besu nodes for the Ropsten Merge, please update to this snapshot release which has some fixes for empty block proposals and some other small issues.  

https://hyperledger.jfrog.io/ui/native/besu-binaries/besu/22.4.3-SNAPSHOT/
